Home.title: ImgEnhancer.ai
Home.description: Transform your images with advanced AI technology. Enhance quality, upscale resolution, and create stunning visuals with professional-grade image enhancement tools.

Enhance.title: AI Image Enhancement
Enhance.description: Use advanced AI technology to upscale and enhance your images

upload.title: Image
upload.description: Select the image to enhance, supports JPG, PNG, WebP formats
upload.clickSelect: Click to upload or drag image here
upload.supportedFormats: Supports JPG, PNG, WebP formats, max {size}MB
upload.invalidFormat: Only JPG, PNG, WebP format images are supported

settings.scaleDescription: Choose the image scaling factor, higher scale gives better quality but consumes more credits
settings.optimizationDescription: Choose the appropriate optimization type based on image content for better results
settings.promptDescription: Describe how you want to enhance the image, can improve processing results
settings.promptPlaceholder: e.g.: enhance details, improve clarity, maintain natural colors...
settings.advancedDescription: Fine-tune enhancement parameters, requires some image processing experience
settings.engineDescription: Model customized with AI technology to make your work more suitable
settings.creativityDescription: Control AI creativity, negative values are more conservative, positive values are more innovative
settings.fractalityDescription: Control prompt strength and pixel complexity

history.title: Enhancement History
history.emptyDescription: You haven't used the image enhancement feature yet

messages.loginDescription: Please log in first to use the image enhancement feature
messages.comingSoon: This feature is under development, please stay tuned
messages.downloadServiceNotConfigured: Download service not configured, please contact administrator
messages.selectImageAndStart: Select an image and click the create button to start enhancement
messages.aiProcessing: AI is enhancing your image, please wait
messages.dragToCompare: Drag the divider to view the comparison between original and enhanced images

AIDemo.title: AI Capabilities Demo
AIDemo.description: This page showcases non-public features and is exclusively for users who have purchased the template. It's designed for learning and testing the AI model invocation process. To use it, simply launch the template locally and input your API key in the environment variables. The AI demo includes functionalities like single-turn and multi-turn conversations, text-to-image, image-to-image, and text/image-to-video conversions. Through this demo, you can quickly grasp the AI invocation workflow, accelerating your journey in building AI applications.
AIDemo.metaDescription: This page showcases AI capabilities including single-turn and multi-turn conversations, text-to-image, image-to-image, and text/image-to-video conversions.
